title: Under The Veil
description: Meena, a fifteen-year-old Afghani girl, lives with her family in Kabul. Life is good until the Taliban takes over and, â€œovernight, everything vanished. Her parents lose their jobs, and Meena loses her freedom to attend school, to walk outside, and even to show her face. Even in her own home she is afraid to speak freely because her uncle is One of Them.
author: Laura Moe
